mapper.sql: id, password, login_id, phone, name, sex, birthday, head_url, location, occupation, visit_state, hospital, remarks, createtime, updatetime, easemob_uuid, source, identification, bp_deviceID,bs_deviceID,medical_card
mapper.select:
select
from patient_user
name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
SELECT count(1) count from patient_user where '${startTime}' <= createtime and createtime < '${endTime}'

select
from patient_user 1=1
AND name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}),'%')
AND phone like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{phone}),'%')
